thread.section_title: Matboard and More Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Matboard and More | matboardandmore.com
thread.title: E Hagens
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by E Hagens

author: E Hagens
title: E Hagens
text: I went onto the website and ordered two mats for pictures I wanted to hang, but that didn't fit into the frames I bought. Your mat size calculator helped me thru the sizing process, never having done this before. They were perfect! The pictures look great now and are ready to hang. I will use your site again. You even sent an email after I ordered asking if I wanted to change anything last minute. But I trusted the sizing calculator and was not disappointed.
